content: पीडित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [पीड्-क्त] {@--1@} Pained, harassed, tormented, oppressed, pinched. {@--2@} Squeezed, pressed, <ls>Mu. 2. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Espoused, held, seized; <ls>U. 7. 5.</ls> {@--4@} Violated, broken. {@--5@} Laid waste, devastated. {@--6@} Eclipsed. {@--7@} Bound, tied --तं {@--1@} Paining, injuring, harassing. {@--2@} A particular mode of sexual enjoyment. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Fast, closely, firmly.
